Package com.appbrain

This is the AppBrain AppLift SDK, for more information, see The AppBrain AppLift information page.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AdService The AdService provides methods to show the AppBrain offerwall and interstitial
RemoteSettings ServerValues is a collection of values that can be sent back by AppBrain's servers to your Android app.
 

Class Summary
AppBrain Entry point to the AppBrain AppLift SDK.
ReferrerReceiver This class receives the install string from the Android market.
